meta_title: How to do multiple inserts from inputs
meta_description: Sometimes we need more than just a simple insertion. For example: imagine you are saving answers from a briefing. Maybe you just don’t even know what questions are or maybe you just hate typing unecessarily.
post_title: How to do multiple inserts from inputs
post_about: Sometimes we need more than just a simple insertion. For example: imagine you are saving answers from a briefing. Maybe you just don’t even know what questions are or maybe you just hate typing unnecessarily.
